hero.title: Paint your photo
hero.description: We print your AI-enhanced images on professional canvas with a beautiful beveled edge. Real looking paintings crafted with museum-quality materials for lasting beauty.

upload.title: Upload photo
upload.description: Upload your favorite photo to get started

adjust.title: Adjust photo
adjust.description: Fine-tune your image with AI enhancement

order.title: Place an order
order.description: Select your canvas size and place your order

result.title: Get your painting
result.description: Receive your museum-quality painting at your door

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about Tuus Imago and our mission

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Tuus Imago, we believe that every photo tells a unique story. Our mission is to help you preserve and enhance your most precious memories through cutting-edge AI technology and premium canvas printing services.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2024, Tuus Imago was born from a passion for photography and a vision to make professional photo enhancement accessible to everyone. We combine years of experience in digital imaging with state-of-the-art artificial intelligence to deliver stunning results.

aiEnhancement.label: AI Enhancement:
aiEnhancement.description: We use advanced artificial intelligence to automatically enhance your photos, improving colors, sharpness, and overall quality.

canvasPrinting.label: Canvas Printing:
canvasPrinting.description: Your enhanced photos are printed on premium canvas using archival-quality inks that ensure vibrant colors for generations to come.

customFraming.label: Custom Framing:
customFraming.description: Choose from a variety of frame options to perfectly complement your artwork and home décor.

qualityFirst.label: Quality First:
qualityFirst.description: We never compromise on quality, from the enhancement algorithms to the printing process and final delivery.

customerSatisfaction.label: Customer Satisfaction:
customerSatisfaction.description: Your happiness is our priority. We work tirelessly to ensure you love every photo you receive.

innovation.label: Innovation:
innovation.description: We continuously invest in the latest AI and imaging technologies to bring you the best results possible.

sustainability.label: Sustainability:
sustainability.description: We are committed to environmentally responsible practices, from eco-friendly inks to sustainable packaging materials.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you!

legal.title: Legal Information
legal.subtitle: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At Tuus Imago, we take your privacy seriously. All uploaded photos are processed securely and are used solely for the purpose of AI enhancement and canvas printing services.

dataCollection.label: Data Collection:
dataCollection.description: We only collect the photos you upload and any necessary contact information for service delivery.

dataStorage.label: Data Storage:
dataStorage.description: Your photos are stored securely on encrypted cloud servers.

dataUsage.label: Data Usage:
dataUsage.description: Photos are used exclusively for processing and delivering your orders. We never share your images with third parties without explicit consent.

dataRetention.label: Data Retention:
dataRetention.description: Your data is retained only as long as necessary to complete your order and provide customer support.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

serviceUse.label: Service Use:
serviceUse.description: You agree to use our AI enhancement and printing services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.

contentOwnership.label: Content Ownership:
contentOwnership.description: You retain full ownership of all photos you upload. Tuus Imago obtains a limited license to process and deliver your photos.

refundPolicy.label: Refund Policy:
refundPolicy.description: Refunds are available within 30 days of delivery if the product quality does not meet our standards.

limitationOfLiability.label: Limitation of Liability:
limitationOfLiability.description: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our services beyond the purchase price of your order.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.description: For any questions regarding our privacy policy or terms of service, please contact us:

upload.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop your image here
upload.fileSupport: Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP files up to 10MB
upload.aiAdjustmentsHint: Select one or more AI effects and switch between original and AI preview.
upload.aiPreviewError: AI preview could not be rendered. Check selected effects and try again.

uploader.dragCropArea: Drag the crop area to select the region to keep

checkout.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
